alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 5:18PM MDT until June 03 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 517 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Antelope Springs to near Adena School, or along a line extending from 26 miles southwest of Sterling to 9 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Brush around 525 PM MDT. Hillrose and Gary around 535 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
